trans-unit.source: Represents the run-time behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> enables the control of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> Umożliwia kontrolę nad <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> opcje, takie jak <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> i <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: Some of these properties can be set only using the constructor of the class.
trans-unit.target: Niektóre z tych właściwości można ustawić tylko za pomocą konstruktora klasy.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> can be replaced using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.CreateSerializer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: W takim przypadku <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> można zastąpić przy użyciu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.CreateSerializer%2A> metody.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md).

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> to replace the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate> returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.DataContractSurrogate%2A> property, see [Data Contract Surrogates](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] przy użyciu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> zastąpić <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate> zwrócony przez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.DataContractSurrogate%2A> właściwości, zobacz [surogaty kontraktu danych](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example finds the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> in the collection of behaviors for an operation and resets the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Poniższy przykład umożliwia znalezienie <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> w kolekcji zachowań dla operacji i resetuje <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> i <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class with the specified operation description.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> klasy z opisem określonej operacji.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> that is used to control the serialization process.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class with the specified operation description and data contract format.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior" /> z określoną operacją opis i format kontraktu danych.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> for serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy wystąpienie klasy, która dziedziczy <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> dla procesów serializacji i deserializacji.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to create the serializer for.
The name of the generated type.
The namespace of the generated type.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains known types.
Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> for serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy wystąpienie klasy, która dziedziczy <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> dla procesów serializacji i deserializacji.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> class.

Both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> class.
The type to serialize or deserialize.
The name of the serialized type.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> that contains the namespace of the serialized type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> Zawiera obszar nazw typu serializacji.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains known types.

Creates an instance of a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> for serialization and deserialization processes with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> that contains the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy wystąpienie klasy, która dziedziczy <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> dla serializacji i deserializacji procesów z <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> zawierającą przestrzeń nazw.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a class that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" /> class.

Both the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.NetDataContractSerializer> inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> associated with the operation.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute" /> associated with the operation.
Gets or sets an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" /> that is used to dynamically map types during serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia implementację <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" /> umożliwiające dynamicznie mapowania typów podczas serializacji i deserializacji procesów.

trans-unit.source: Type: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver" />
A class that maps an <see langword="xsi:type" /> to a known data contract type.
trans-unit.target: Klasa, która mapuje <see langword="xsi:type" /> do typu kontraktu danych znane.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> class document.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver> klasy dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a surrogate to be used during the serialization and deserialization processes.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia zastępczego do użycia podczas serializacji i deserializacji procesów.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> that is used as a substitute serializer.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the data provided by an extension of a type (and therefore not in the data contract) is ignored or not.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość określającą, czy dane są dostarczane przez rozszerzenie typu (i w związku z tym nie jest w kontrakcie danych) jest ignorowane.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore the data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> ignorowanie danych; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the extra data is returned with any other serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wartość `true`, dodatkowe dane są zwracane z zserializowanymi danymi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject> interfejsu.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia maksymalną liczbę elementów na wykresie obiektu do serializacji lub deserializacji.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Maksymalna liczba elementów na wykresie obiektu do serializacji lub deserializacji.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to add the parameters to.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters to add.
Adds a collection of parameters to the behavior.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation" /> that represents a client.
Attaches a client behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: Dołącza zachowanie klienta, aby wykonać operację.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation" /> to attach the behavior to.
Applies the behavior to the operation.
An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation to validate.
Validates the operation.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> to use for the export.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> do użycia na potrzeby eksportu.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> for the WSDL.
Exports the WSDL representation of the operation.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> to use for the export.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> do użycia na potrzeby eksportu.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> for the WSDL.
Exports the endpoint description as a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Eksportuje opis punktu końcowego jako dokument WSDL.
